nodes.text: Argus "Six Eyes" Panox was a six-eyed Azumel male who lived in the galaxy during the reign of the Galactic Empire. He was present during Lando Calrissian and Han Solo's first sabacc game.

The character of Argus Panox was first revealed in an Omaze Force For Change charity program video for the Star Wars Anthology Series film Solo: A Star Wars Story, released on April 18, 2017. The character was later identified by name in a Denny's-exclusive Topps trading card. A Solo commercial from Denny's featured Panox watching several individuals playing a game of sabacc, including Han Solo and Lando Calrissian.
